overview.content: These terms govern the use of AniVerse (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") and define the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between users and operators.

intellectual_property.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.rights: All rights to the Service and related content belong to the operator.
intellectual_property.prohibition: Users may not reproduce or distribute content without the operator's permission.

governing_law.title: 7. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governing_law.law: These terms shall be interpreted and applied in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Korea.
governing_law.disputes: Disputes arising from the use of the Service shall be resolved in accordance with relevant legal procedures.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: AniVerse (hereinafter referred to as "AniVerse") values users' personal information and protects it safely in accordance with relevant laws and regulations. The Service also provides login functionality through the Google platform, collecting only the minimum necessary personal information through this process.

collection.title: 1. Personal Information Collected and Collection Methods
collection.items: Items collected: Name, email address (provided by Google login provider)
collection.method: Collection method: Automatically collected through Google login integration

retention.title: 3. Retention and Use Period of Personal Information
retention.deletion: All personal information is immediately destroyed upon withdrawal without delay.

third_party.title: 4. Third-Party Provision of Personal Information
third_party.no_sharing: Collected personal information is not provided to external parties.
third_party.exception: However, it may be exceptionally provided when required by law.

entrustment.title: 5. Personal Information Processing Entrustment
entrustment.none: Currently, personal information processing is not entrusted to third parties.

cookies.title: 6. Automatically Collected Information and Cookies
cookies.usage: Cookies may be used for login maintenance and statistical analysis.
cookies.blocking: Cookies can be blocked through user browser settings.

rights.title: 7. User Rights and Exercise Methods
rights.access: Users may request access, correction, deletion, or suspension of processing of personal information.
rights.contact: For inquiries, please contact us through the profile page.

effective_date.title: 9. Policy Changes
effective_date.date: This policy takes effect from January 1, 2025.
